action.script:
filename=${file:name}
EXTENSION=$(echo "$filename" | sed 's/^.*\.//')

input=$1
if [ $EXTENSION == "PDF" ] || [ $EXTENSION == "pdf" ]
then
    git show HEAD:${file:name} > A.pdf
    git show HEAD^:${file:name} > B.pdf
    diff-pdf --output-diff=C.pdf A.pdf B.pdf
    #"C:\Program Files\SumatraPDF\SumatraPDF.exe" C.pdf
    mupdf C.pdf
    rm -f A.pdf B.pdf C.pdf
else
    echo "This is not .PDF file."
fi

filename=${file:name}
EXTENSION=$(echo "$filename" | sed 's/^.*\.//')

input=$1
if [ $EXTENSION == "PNG" ] || [ $EXTENSION == "png" ]
then
    git show HEAD^:${file:name} > A.png
    git show HEAD:${file:name} > B.png
    #magick compare A.png B.png -highlight-color red C.png
    #magick compare A.png B.png -compose Src C.png
    magick compare A.png B.png C.png
    #imdisplay C.png
    #Honeyview.exe C.png
    qView.exe C.png
    rm -f A.png B.png C.png
    echo Finished.
else
    echo "This is not .PNG file."
fi

git branch -r | grep -v "\->" | sed "s,\x1B\[[0-9;]*[a-zA-Z],,g" | while read remote; do git branch --track "${remote#origin/}" "$remote"; done
git fetch --all
git pull --all

git pull origin ${ref}
git pull origin main

# paths
PWD=$(pwd)
filepath=${file}
filedir=$(dirname ${filepath})
fileext=$(echo "$filepath" | sed 's/^.*\.//')
filebase=$(basename $filepath .${fileext})
totalfilepath=${PWD}/${filedir}

# Windows Style Path
DRIVE=${totalfilepath:1:1}
DIRA=${totalfilepath:2}
DIRB=${DIRA//\//\\}
ORGfilepathWIN="${DRIVE}:${DIRB}\\${file:name}"
DXFfilepathWIN="${DRIVE}:${DIRB}\\2D\\${filebase}.dxf"


if [ ${fileext} == "SLDDRW" ] || [ ${fileext} == "slddrw" ]
then
    python /d/github/git-fork-sw/swSaveAs.py ${ORGfilepathWIN} DXF
else
    echo "This is not .SLDDRW file."
fi

# paths
PWD=$(pwd)
filepath=${file}
filedir=$(dirname ${filepath})
fileext=$(echo "$filepath" | sed 's/^.*\.//')
filebase=$(basename $filepath .${fileext})
totalfilepath=${PWD}/${filedir}

# Windows Style Path
DRIVE=${totalfilepath:1:1}
DIRA=${totalfilepath:2}
DIRB=${DIRA//\//\\}
ORGfilepathWIN="${DRIVE}:${DIRB}\\${file:name}"

if [ ${fileext} == "SLDPRT" ] || [ ${fileext} == "sldprt" ] || [ ${fileext} == "SLDASM" ] || [ ${fileext} == "sldasm" ]
then
    python /d/github/git-fork-sw/swSaveAs.py ${ORGfilepathWIN} STEP
else
    echo "This is not .SLDPRT or .SLDASM file."
fi

# paths
PWD=$(pwd)
filepath=${file}
filedir=$(dirname ${filepath})
fileext=$(echo "$filepath" | sed 's/^.*\.//')
filebase=$(basename $filepath .${fileext})
totalfilepath=${PWD}/${filedir}
BOMfilepath=${totalfilepath}/BOM
DRAWfilepath=${totalfilepath}/2D
csvfile=${filebase}.csv

# Windows Style Path
DRIVE=${BOMfilepath:1:1}
DIRA=${BOMfilepath:2}
DIRB=${DIRA//\//\\}
BOMfilepathWIN="${DRIVE}:${DIRB}\\${csvfile}"
ORGfilepathWIN="${DRIVE}:${DIRB}\\${file:name}"

if [ ! -e ${BOMfilepathWIN} ]
then
    python /d/github/git-fork-sw/swBOM-CSV.py ${totalfilepath}/${file:name}
fi

if [ ${fileext} == "SLDASM" ] || [ ${fileext} == "sldasm" ]
then
    python /d/github/git-fork-sw/swBOM-GUI.py ${totalfilepath}/${file:name}
else
    echo "This is not .SLDASM file."
fi
